body.name: VKAROOD Smart Watch for Men Women, Fitness Tracker with Call, Ultra Thin 1.43" OLED Touch Screen, IP67 Waterproof, Heart Rate Blood Oxygen Monitor Android iOS(with 2 Bands), (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 50 mins
features: This smart watch comes with 2 straps, one steel and one silicone.

【Fitness Tracker】This smart watch has advanced sensors that detect our real-time heart rate throughout the day. The smartwatch also automatically monitors our sleep status, blood pressure and blood oxygen. Synchronized with the APP "Dafit".

【Activity Tracker】This android smart watch records real-time data such as heart rate, steps, calories burned, distance and active time during exercise. This sports smartwatch offers more than 100 exercise modes. This fitness tracker is IP67 water resistant so we can wear it during outdoor activities, rainy days and hand washing, no swimming.

【Information Notification】 The smart watch supports AI voice assistant, after connecting to phone via Bluetooth, we can directly use the smartwatch to wake up our phone, answer or make calls, read app messages, store contact information, and view call logs.

【1.43'' Amoled】 The smart watch adopts personalized amoled round screen, 178° wide viewing angle, higher color accuracy and wider color gamut. Cloud has a variety of custom dials, we can also choose our own photo as the dial, to create a personalized style of men and women smartwatch. 250mAh battery can last up to 7 days, worry-free use.
【Ideal Gift】The best gift for friends, boyfriend or girlfriend, the best gift choice for Christmas, New Year, Valentine's Day.18 months free warranty, 24 hours after-sales worry-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality and Affordable Smart Watch
reviews.reviewText: This is a much higher quality watch than I was expecting due to the low price of it. I love how straightforward setting this watch up was unlike some of the more expensive watches that like to make life difficult to look fancy. One of my favorite features is how this watch does not require constant charging like other smart watches I have used. It is lightweight, made of sturdy material, easily connects to phones, is comfortable to wear and comes with two wrist straps to choose from; one metal and one silicon. It also comes with an 18 months warranty which proves how confident the seller is in their product.As far as using the watch goes, the screen is high quality and navigating through its menus is smooth and intuitive. It has all the functionalities I need and from what I've seen so far it seems to do a better job of measuring vitals than other smart watches I have tried. It accepts calls smoothly, shows text messages I receive clearly and has a flashlight function. It is also customizable and has a good sized library of watch faces to choose from. This is a product I would recommend to anyone on a budget that is looking for a high quality smart watch.

reviews.reviewerName: Roy P - Oakland CaliforniaRoy P - Oakland California
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy for a thin watch… great buy
reviews.reviewText: This digital watch exceeded my expectations! The wide array of watch faces lets me switch up my look effortlessly. Its health and exercise monitoring capabilities provide valuable insights into my well-being. User-friendly and reasonably priced, it's a true bargain for budget-conscious shoppers. The bonus of an extra stylish wrist band adds a touch of flair, making it well worth every penny. Five stars for this outstanding timepiece!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Suave smart watch with huge screen and all the features
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Want to get with the times and get a smartwatch? But don't want to spend hundreds of dollars? The square screen isn't for you? Then you are looking at the right smartwatch here. This smartwatch has a large, smooth circular interface. The screen is clear, bright, and very responsive to touch. It has all the functionality you would want in a smartwatch like receiving calls/messages, a fitness tracker, a health monitor, etc. It has a very long battery life and easily connects to your phone. The only downside was that the strap was hard to figure out at first, but it was easy once I got it on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: At this price point I was impressed. The watch has a lot of features including some that dont work on the top brands such as blood pressure. The messages come through on time as well as calls. The watch is lightweight and easy to wear. I like that you get both a metal and silicone strap as I am unable to wear metal due to allergies to nickle. The watch causes no issues. Well packaged, easy to put on the strap you want. Cant ask for more especially at about 1/7th the cost.Screen is bright and has a nice usb magnetic charger that clicks right in. Charges quickly.I havent tried the sleep feature, but the rest work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Honestly I wasn't expecting it to be this high quality. It connects to the phone effortlessly. Screen is magestic and really high resolution. It can measure heart rate, blood pressure and oxygen levels too and track activity, basically does everything that brand smartwatches. do but for way less money. Also watch banda that comes wothbir really nice as well. Overall Highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great smart watch for the price
reviews.reviewText: Great quality watch for the price. I was looking for inexpensive, decent quality watch for daily use, exercise etc and when I came across this one I was pleasantly surprised. The wristband and the watch itself are made out of good quality materials (heavy and comfortable) and look great. The display, and the menu of the watch is easy to navigate and very intuitive. I would recommend this watch as it seems to be a great product so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Watch so far
reviews.reviewText: I used Fitbit watches for years and was accustomed to tracking some data like steps and sleep. After some failures, I switched to a Samsung watch. While it has many capabilities, I have never been satisfied and really hate having to charge the watch constantly.This watch is several times less expensive than those name brands and does everything I need in a simpler way. I have tried out a few watch-faces and have not yet decided which I prefer. It was extremely easy to set up and seems to do a better job of measuring blood pressure than the Samsung watch. I is very close to what my home blood pressure test kit registers. This gives me confidence that it’s measurement will be accurate. The sleep data is as robust as others as well. I use the Heart Rate, SpO2 (Oxygen level), Blood Pressure, and sleep data to help monitor my personal health. The weather screen is superior to previous watches I have owned.It accepts calls, shows my messages, and has many features I have only started to look at. It even has a flashlight function. It isn’t extremely bright, but great in a pinch.Overall, I am very please so far. I would like a second charging cord, so maybe that will be something I look for down the road. I really like that it takes a standard band vs the proprietary bands from the big brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and Stylish Smartwatch
reviews.reviewText: just got my hands on this beautifully designed smartwatch that comes at a very affordable price! Setting it up was a breeze, and it paired seamlessly with my phone. While I initially got it for step tracking, I was happy to discover additional features like sleep tracking and oxygen monitoring. The watch effortlessly connects with my phone for calls and messages, making it seem like a fantastic deal. ! Oh, and it comes with an 18-month warranty. Will update more updates in a few days about the experience.
